1018150.name: SUPER DRAGON BALL HEROES WORLD MISSION - Anime Music Pack 1
1018150.description:
Note that songs included are their respective abridged versions.

You must have the full retail version of the game to use this content. Additionally, you must be playing on the latest version of the game to access the content.

This Anime Music Pack includes a total of 11 songs coming from the original Anime of DRAGON BALL, DRAGON BALL Z, and even DRAGON BALL GT!

The ultimate dream for every DRAGON BALL fan and a real treat for the ears!

Songs included:
- BOKUTACHIWA TENSHIDATTA
- CHA-LA HEAD-CHA-LA
- DAN DAN KOKORO HIKARETEKU
- DETEKOI TOBIKIRI ZENKAI POWER
- KYOUFUNO GINYUU TOKUSENTAI
- MAKAFUSHIGI ADVENTURE
- NEW HERO TOUJOU
- PROLOGUE & SUBTITLE 1
- ROMANTIC AGERUYO
- SOLID STATE SCOUTER
- WE GOTTA POWER
1018150.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
